page.title: 03School: Lawshall & Shimpling
page.content: The curriculum is very wide and varied. Apart from Maths, Language and Topic Work they have lessons on the computer, (Lawshall run their own Tuck Shop & keep a record of sales & stock control on the computer).Art,Music(including playing guitars at Lawshall & handbells at Shimpling)Cookery,Needlework,Drama, P.E.and a lot of Envirnomental Studies. Both schools are Church of England con- trolled so the Christian Religion is taught and local Clergy visit weekly to instruct the children. Lawshall school has a Parent Teachers Association which helps to enhance community life in the village with their many social funct- ions to raise funds for buying equip- ment for school e.g.financial help with the computer, musical instruments,P.E. equipment,books & outings to the children's theatre.
